reviews.review:
🤔 oque e dead by dalight ??

dead by day light e um jogo no qual existe 4 sobreviventes cada um com sua tecnica que tem que fazer 5 geradores para abrir o portão e também você pode jogar de monstro em qual seu objetivo e pegar cada um dos sobreviventes e colocar em um gancho cada monstro tem um poder especifico

❤ pontos positivos

-o jogo tem um grande potencial e uma grande ideia

-o jogo tem ótimos graficos 

-o jogo tem um sistema de patente

-o jogo tem poucos bugs

-o anti-cheat e bom

❌ pontos ruins

-o jogo não e tão bem otimizado

-alguns monstros são muito apelões 

🔥🔥atenção

essa e só minha opinião caso descorde de algo que eu disse apenas coloque nos comentarios

-Obrigado pela atenção

不知道是我的问题还是游戏的问题，动不动就同步错误吞血点，游戏体验极差。
说真的，我是个不爱差评的人，我要么就是好评或干脆不评论，但这次我真的忍不了了。
es un juego que esta piola,tiene buenos graficos,y no se. es un juego perfecto
very fun with friends and even to play online

jogo muito divertido, eu realmente gosto de jogar dbd, um pouco mal otimizado... e alguns bugs, jogo muito repetitivo mas com amigos fica muito mais jogavel, dlc perfeitas com personagens licenciados, como: myers, freddy, pig (saw) e a perfeição da dlc do silent hill <3 recomendo muito !
Super fun, if you like horror its a great game.

Great Game. Only Game that has most of my favorite iconic killers from childhood and it even has stranger things. its pretty good. There are negatives to the game but none that would keep me from the game. Worth the buy.
Fun but can be stressful playing as a killer. Would highly recommend
buenardooooo brotheeer no hay ningún juego que se le parezca

Es buen juego, buena jugabilidad, buena ambientacion y mapas copados. Lo unico de lo que me quejo es del emparejamiento, muchas veces me paso que siendo rango 15 de superviviente me emparejaba con supervivientes y asesino de rango 1-4, y lo mismo me pasa cuando soy asesino. Otra cosa mala pero que no es culpa del juego es la comunidad, ni idea si soy yo que tengo mala suerte o que, pero en la mayoria de las partidas me encontre a tipos que se enojaban porque los mataste y de repente sos tunelero y camper, o manco.

Terrible Power Creep for Killers and currently the match making is more broken than the middle east. Brand new killers constantly get matched with rank 1-4 survivors and it ruins their sometimes first experience. I think its a plot to let high level killer and survivor streamers to get faster queues to promote the game instead of caring about their game. Its fun if you have 4 survivors or if you enjoy killer but they can't seem to figure out match making 4 years into the game. And there are always more glitches with every patch, many times ruining the experience for someone. Bad graphical integrity for hits or pallet slams etc. Its fun just don't take it too seriously, its a joke of a game. If you're unable to control your emotions like an adult like I fail to do, these glitches and power creep will drive you to drinking and ripping your hair out. Million dollar company btw.

Recomiendo este juego para toda aquella persona que es un asesino contenido por estas maldita cultura del buen hombre. Llego a casa de mi vida rutinaria y laboral para descargar mis deseos violentos reprimidos en este juego, me genera una exitación sexual matal supervivients, verlos sufrir y pedir inclemencia.

so noed?

jokes aside, I would love to recommend this game, its really fun and matches can be interesting, however... there are a lot of issues with balance of perks on both sides, survivor and killer, there are a lot of maps that are either killer sided or survivor sided (though I suppose you could call that adding challenges for each side during each match?), imbalanced killers (prepare to see a lot of one kind of killer), the problem of survive with friends groups coming in with specialized builds and shitting all over a killer, and finally the absolutely, positively, outrageously toxic community that either calls the killer a tunneling, slugging POS baby killer, etc etc. Or killers that call survivors talentless idiots who use perks as such hard crutches to do anything or giant babies for getting destroyed by Hex: Ruin or No One Escapes Death. A lot of blame throwing and toxicity, mingled together with a lot of balancing issues throws a lot of dirt over a game that is incredible, and I mean TRULY incredible. There's no thrill like escaping from a killer by the skin of your teeth, or managing to kill every. single. survivor. using nothing but your mindgaming skills as killer.

Basically, the game is fun, exciting, and rewarding to play, but is burdened with terrible balance in perks, killers, maps, SWF groups, etc etc.

With all things considered, especially the new issue of matchmaking throwing high rank 
players versus low rank ones, 

I CANNOT recommend this game as it is right now. 

Too many problems, combined with added difficulty from being unable to find real help from any forum or discussion of this game due to rampant toxicity makes things hard for a newer player. Only play this if the idea of having a few good matches thrown in with a lot of really frustrating and sweaty ones appeals to you. And don't think about using nonoptimal perks, unless you know what you are doing, you are in for a bad time.

C'est un excellent jeu mélangeant Horreur et Survie et mettant en scène de nombreux meurtriers connu de certains films comme Halloween, Massacre à la tronçonneuse ou même Les griffes de la nuit. C'est à vous de survivre tout en les esquivant et vous échapper de l'endroit où vous êtes enfermé.
Le gameplay est plaisant et facile à prendre en main, le seul problème du moment est le matchmaking qui vous fait tomber souvent avec des gens qui ont beaucoup plus d'expérience que vous sur le jeu et le rend extrêmement difficile, mise à part ce défaut là, le jeu est vraiment bien. 
Je le recommande vraiment !
Excelente juego para experimentar momentos adrenalínicos si juegas de superviviente, pero por lo general juego a 120-150 ms, por lo que podría ser algo que podría mejorar

Second time in two days that the game crashed for a message from EAC, and because of that I lost my rank position. Now, yesterday I played with a killer who cheated all the time! He killed me when he was 2 meters away, and he wasn't even looking at me, so EAC please do your fucking job and disconnect the real cheater!
eu odeio esse jogo mas recomendo
Хорошая игра, по началу держит в напряжении и даже чуть-чуть боишься. После часов 2-3 игры, понимаешь что это не хоррор.
Jogo excelente,mesmo com diversos bugs, porem recomendo não dar ouvidos ao chat do time inimigo no pós partida e jogar da maneira que voce se divertir mais!

ИГРА МОЖЕТ ЗАТЯНУТЬ
плюсы:

1.из + могу выделить большое количество маньяков  с разнообразными фишками, но не все они доступны с начала. МАНЬЯКИ ПО ЛИЦЕНЗИЯМ ТОЛЬКО ЗА ДОНАТ, но на распродаже они стоят от силы бакса 3.

2.если у вас есть стак 4 человека, то игра за выживших генерирует очень много смешных  ситуаций и очень интересна.

3.так же присутствует лор, и лично мне нравиться в нем копаться .

минусы:

1.Если ты соло игрок, то за выживших играть будет очень скучно

2.Сильный дизбаланс в поиске противника.Ты можешь быть 15 ранга, а тебе закинут маньяка 1 ранга.

3.Много токсиков в числе выживших, как бы ты не играл за маньяка, ты все равно 'м у д а к'.

4.Есть откровенно слабые и очень сильные маньяки.

5.Постоянная  игра за выживших однообразна, т.к у них нету своих определенных фишек как у маньяков, только 3 перка.

6.Если у вас слабый интернет, то вам тут делать нечего, будет фризить и иногда не засчитывать результаты матча.

 7.присутствуют баги когда тебя убивают через стены и ebnytыe хитбоксы выживших для охотницы.

заключение:

хоть минусов и написал и побольше, но их всегда легче искать чем плюсы, самое главное что игра интересная и способна предоставить хотя бы пару веселых вечеров.

когда мне казалось, что игра в плачевном состоянии, многоуважаемые разработчики выпустили патч 6.1.0
теперь я хочу, чтобы игра вернулась обратно в плачевное состояние D:

it's gotten to the point where the killer doesn't chase me, i chase the killer.

don't play this game if you want to lose brain cells. i've lost quite a lot. play at your own risk :)

p.s dbd is very fun with friends, i've made a lot of memories whilst playing this game. just beware of solo-q as it just brings so much pain :')

weirdly competitive game but not so much that its no fun anymore. 

if you want to try DbD just be read to be bullied by some survivor mains or camped on hook by some sweaty killer.

glhf

Игра захватывает. Достаточно сыграть пару раз,чтобы понять смысл игры. Она на протяжении всего матча держит вас в непередаваемой атмосфере. В общем: если вы любите онлайн,хорроры и игры,где нужно думать и  выручать товарищей - то эта игра вам подойдёт. Я вам гарантирую!
Жаль,что забанили(
This game is a fun game

Игра в которой нет баланса не за сурвов не за маньяка,особенно матчмэйкинг. Когда ты новичек, тебе просто по кд закидывает топовых рангов.В итоги ты не поиграешь в удовольствие и ничему не научишься потому что не дадут. Несоветую играть и тратить деньги на эту игру,она этого не стоит хуже чем помойка. Всем удачи

[h1] DO NOT BUY THIS GAME [/h1]
Anti cheat system is a joke, support system is a joke. I got to play 3-4 matches until I got the "party creation failed" error. 
After that I proceeded to check the game files using steam (which found some missing files and downloaded them) but still no deal. After rebooting my machine, there's the perma ban notification. I opened support tickets and they claim I broke the game's EULA on several accounts and my access to the game has been revoked, which makes no sense, this is the only account I own, and I didn't even have enough time to try to break something or cheat even if I wanted to. Simply ridiculous.
[b] Do not buy this game unless you want to throw away your cash[\b]. You have been warned. You can look up similar cases, I'm not the only one.
it is fun but people are toxic so its like any other public event.
game doesn't even load in for me man.. it keeps on crashing.
